name: Fireboy and Watergirl
summary: In the first game in the famous game series "Fireboy and Watergirl", the boy and the girl arrive to the forest temple. Fire boy and water girl need to go through different levels to find their way out. This two-players game can only be completed if the two players work together in cooperation to find the solution for each room in the temple. Fireboy can not step into water and Watergirl can't step into the hot lava, but they can help each other by pushing buttons and by moving doors.
info:
• 中文名: 森林冰火人
  • 游戏类型: 平台冒险
  • 游戏引擎: flash
  • 游玩人数: 1-2
  • 官方网站: https://www.fireboynwatergirl.com
